jobs.title: Studio Data Science
jobs.description:
üëã Hey, We're Founders Factory

Founders Factory is improving the odds of startup success, empowering anyone to impact the world through entrepreneurship.

We‚Äôre changing the venture model, trusting our ability to make a real difference to the companies we invest in. Our platform gives entrepreneurs market access to multi-national corporates, and bespoke operational support from a big and brilliant team. This allows us to do things that don‚Äôt scale, tailoring a program to every startup that joins. Letting our startups tap into skills they need but can‚Äôt yet access.

All of this is funded by our corporate partners, but their role is not simply cash. They bring the best bits of their businesses to our startups - validation, distribution, insight and capital. These are ingredients that startups others don‚Äôt have, which is why you see startups here that can not exist anywhere else.¬†

We‚Äôre here so founders who see the future differently get the skills they need to make it a reality. We‚Äôre proud to back founders others wouldn‚Äôt and we back ourselves to make them successful. We know the biggest impact comes from those that don‚Äôt fit the mould so we‚Äôve made Founders Factory their home.

As we expand, our startup studio and accelerator companies require more data science support than ever and now we're looking for a Studio Data Scientist. This will include working closely with our studio teams to advise on and build algorithms that have the potential to change industries. You will also add value and provide guidance where needed to leverage our corporate investors‚Äô internal assets, such as data and domain knowledge.

The successful candidate will work closely with our Chief Scientific Officer, Jeffrey Ng, who looks after the AI sector.

There is large scope to help an amazing range of data-driven and AI companies from the bottom up and a large part of this role will be for you to create as you go.¬†


Responsibilities 
- You will be consulting and advising our incubator businesses on data pipelines and AI implementation
- Work with startups in the studio to identify opportunities to apply data science and ML to new products
- Roll-up sleeves and build the algorithms and data science infrastructure that will power our studio startups
- Coach founders using your expertise in data science and management to build big businesses
- Define your own role 


Requirements
- MSc and/or PhD in a quantitative subject (e.g. Computer Science, Engineering, Machine Learning)
- Recommender systems
- Python coding
- Natural Language Processing and Understanding
- Computer vision and Image Recognition systems
- Have high emotional intelligence and empathy for our founders as well as for your fellow colleagues in the founders factory operations team
- Be organised with a strong attention to detail and an ability to balance detail with the big picture.
- Have exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, both written and verbal.
- Have great knowledge of what makes a good process and being able to apply frameworks and methodologies for the right problem
- 1-2 years experience, especially coaching team members or interfacing with product managers/stakeholders


Not essential but nice to haves
- Entrepreneurial¬†
- Understands business value and what moves the needle¬†
- Ambition to work on product or build a startup
- Business savvy 


üìà Benefits

We provide all the excitement and freedom of an early stage startup but with the stability and resources of a large organisation. This is your rare chance to contribute across the full business spectrum to become a founder in the future:

Growth: Work with and meet exceptional talent. Learn faster than you ever have before. Access our large network of investors and customers.
Autonomy: Freedom to execute, build businesses, not just products.
Support: marketing, legal, finance, fundraising, growth, business development and recruitment.
Health and Wellness: Comprehensive extended health care coverage from Vitality and Spill counselling.
Office Space: Desk space in fully-serviced office on High Street Ken with table tennis table, scooters and breakout spaces.
Office Meals: Catered lunches 2 days a week, unlimited breakfast, healthy snacks, freshly ground coffee and Paul‚Äôs Irish Bar.

We are committed to building a diverse culture and are eager to receive applications from all backgrounds. All applicants will receive consideration for employment without discrimination.

Please note: we have an overwhelming number of applications and will do our best to get back to you within 72 hours if you fit the bill.

jobs.title: Studio Director - Founders Factory Milano
jobs.description:
üôåThe Role

At Founders Factory our mission is to reliably power founders to go further faster. Our venture studio is at the heart of this challenge and the¬†Studio Director¬†role will lead on delivering against that mission. With an ambition to build 4 new stand-alone companies every year, the focus of the role is on empowering entrepreneurs & teams towards success in those growing businesses. As such, you will lead the support & guidance on building our studio operations team, products & ventures. 

At heart, the Studio Director a product builder who knows from firsthand experience what it takes to create, develop and grow things from scratch. 


üëåResponsibilities
- Support & empower our studio operations in Italy and founding teams to success through the ventures we build together.
- Lead a team that will deliver an array of powerful business concepts on quarterly basis, per each corporate partner.
- Define and ensure studio strategic objectives are met.
- Grow & lead the Founders Factory operations product development teams ‚Äì venture design, product, tech, design.
- Be taking big ideas and, with your team, turning them into something tangible and investable.
- Coach/mentor entrepreneurs & co-founders through the challenges of building a startup.


üëçWe require candidates to have:
- Minimum 10 years working experience
- Been a startup founder or have been in founding team, demonstrating your hands-on capability
- Line managed multiple product development teams, with a variety of functions.
- Built multiple teams from scratch ‚Äì small, big, local, remote, co-founders, contractors.
- Deep product & technical experience, having built products that have their fingerprints all over them.
- A creative and analytical mind who can take leaps to arrive at new conclusions
- Desire to impact business strategy and work across different projects at rapid pace.
- Experience creating an environment where your team feel comfortable and confident enough to take risks and be creative.
- The candidate must be fluent in Italian and English, with a strong International background and mindset
  
- Additional, nice to have: experience in a creative agency 


üéØAbout Us

Founders Factory is a platform which improves the odds of startup success and empowers anyone to impact the world through entrepreneurship.

We‚Äôre changing the venture model, trusting our ability to make a real difference to the companies we invest in. All of this is funded by our corporate partners, but their role is not simply cash. They bring the best bits of their businesses to our startups - validation, distribution, insight and capital. These are ingredients that startups others don‚Äôt have, which is why you see startups here that can not exist anywhere else.¬†

We‚Äôre here so founders who see the future differently get the skills they need to make it a reality. We‚Äôre proud to back founders others wouldn‚Äôt and we back ourselves to make them successful. We know the biggest impact comes from those that don‚Äôt fit the mould so we‚Äôve made Founders Factory their home.

jobs.title: Tech Lead (TMIK)
jobs.description:
#ThisMuchIKnow¬†To power a society that is more knowledgeable, less fearful and is engaging in healthier conversations around the news.¬†

‚úÖ Positive, independent, curious, community and quality driven.
‚õîÔ∏è Negative, biased and sensationalist, undemocratic.¬†
You knowingly consume AND meaningfully contribute. We believe in Changing Tomorrow's Headlines.¬†

The Challenges
I want to 10x our users base by the end of the year. This represents scalability challenges that you most foresee and design around.¬†

Success to us is measured in user delight, then we see that sentiment convert into revenue. This requires someone to really dig deep, this will not be fun for someone who only focuses on getting a customer to a landing page or a checkout.¬†

As the most senior tech person on our team you will have to provide leadership and grow into a CTO level operator as we scale. 

Growth mindset and an appetite for learning will be key.¬†The majority of the team have a journalist background. Please explain very technical things with as little jargon as possible.¬†¬†

The Tech stack at the moment¬†¬†
‚Ä¢ Our MVP was built with React Native on the frontend so we could go to market quicker across both app stores.
‚Ä¢ The main serverside language is node.JS but there are elements written in Python (Django)
‚Ä¢ We are use Contentful as our Headless CMS¬†
‚Ä¢ The tracking of our user engagement is measured through MixPanel

Next Steps
‚Ä¢ Download the app
‚Ä¢ Does it speak to you?
‚Ä¢ What could you improve?
‚Ä¢¬†Apply and tell us in the interview

jobs.title: Venture Designer
jobs.description:
You will lead the design of our products and provide structure and process as the business grows. You will focus on desirability and product market fit, from opportunity to defined MVP.



üëåResponsibilities
- Identifying market trends and opportunities
- Designing new products and services from scratch shaping the product and business strategy
- Taking big ideas and turning them into concepts that are tangible for business stakeholders 
- Testing and validating the business appeal by conducting early stage qualitative research using methods such as ethnographic studies, qualitative interviews, and experience mapping
- Workshopping solutions with the wider Factory team 
- Designing business models for early stage concepts 
- Constantly experimenting with new technologies and tools to drive innovation and creativity
- Presenting new concepts to partners and other stakeholders
- Create a go to market strategy with clear differentiating factors and an unfair advantage 
- You will walk the line between product design, product strategy and commercial rigour
  


üëçRequirements
- Human centred design approach - eager to understand what makes people tick
- Ability to tease out problems and rapid experimentation 
- Comfortable working across multiple projects with competing priorities
- Lean methodologies and principles of product development¬†
- A deep understanding of what makes a great business 
- A proven track record of taking ideas and bringing them to life across a range of industries
- Organised with a strong attention to detail and an ability to balance detail with the big picture 
- Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, both written and verbal
- Have worked with a variety of products and industries in your careerHave solid product / graphic design chops, or be willing to learn
- Thrive in uncertainty, being comfortable with taking risks
- Be a self-starter and comfortable working with little direction or oversight
- Start-ups and the tech space are generally of deep interest to you


üëèBenefits
- Share options in the Founders Factory New York portfolio
- Private medical insurance and pension
- Flexible working
- Shared maternity and paternity policies
